title: Cabbage Roll Casserole
directions: In a large Dutch Oven, brown beef and onions in oil over medium high heat with Creole Seasoning until redness in meat is gone. Drain off fat.

In the Dutch Oven combine the tomato sauce, cabbage, and rice. Add meat and mix all together. Pour beef broth over meat mixture and bake in the preheated oven, covered, for 1 hour. Stir, replace cover and bake for another 30 minutes.
ingredients: 2 Tbs. Creole Seasoning Blend plus salt to taste
